programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Dr Dee moved to Alaska and started veterinary practice, and now her Animal House is the top animal hospital in the state. Together with her stuff she handles the most extreme cases and treats everyone, from a reindeer to a sled dog. She can reach the Alaskan most remote areas thanks to her pilots license. She believes with all her heart that all animals deserve the best care. Her husband Ken is a great helper, they rescue unwanted and stray dogs and look for a better place for them.

programme.title: Jeremy Wades Dark Waters
programme.desc: Join biologist and angling expert Jeremy Wade as he travels the world peering through our darkest, murky waters, investigating tales of mythical monsters, mutated beasts and depleting fish populations. The star of River Monsters is back to explain the unexplainable, as he investigates these reported sightings of unknown creatures. Whether its Lake Gardas reptilian monster, a species of pike the size of a man, a river monster deemed extinct in the Outback or South Africas fabled half-man, half-fish monster, Jeremy will need to use all of his experience if he is to catch, or even glimpse, these creatures.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Reality series, set in Texas and similar to North Woods Law, that follows daily lives of men and women who are Game Wardens and whose job is to protect deserts, lakes, woods, bayous, coasts and wild animals that live in the second-largest state in the U.S. These people have their plates full as they must deal with poachers, hunters who dont obey the law, smugglers, while they rescue injured wildlife and defend citizens.

programme.title: Treetop Cat Rescue
programme.desc: Climbing enthusiasts brother-in-law duo Shaun Sears and Tom Otto work together to rescue the felines that climb beyond capability and get stuck in Washington State. The experienced tree climbers do their best to rescue all of the cats they find out about whether a call comes in at day or night. With sometimes unfavourable weather, weak branches and bees nests to overcome the pair have to overcome obstacles and then have to avoid scaring the cats away as they approach.

programme.desc: Unusual biology, unique animal behavior and traits, animal-human relationships, experimental animals, humans who possess animal instincts, exotic breeds, surviving populations and many more unbelievable topics. It delivers in-depth analysis of amazing animal footage and fresh insight from scholars, including Stanford University animal experts Dr. Jill Helms and Dr. Sophia Yin, exotic animal specialist Dave Riherd, and snake wrangler Jason C. McElroy.

programme.title: With a fishing rod to the end of the world
programme.desc: Four avid anglers embark on the adventure of a lifetime, as they travel across the seven continents to fish where no one has fished before. These four, very different characters are made up of Chris Owens, Thad Robison, Brian Jill and Jay Johnson, and all of them have decided to leave their homes and hit the road. With much of the land inaccessible by any other means, theyre driving across the world to reach wild locations, where they will cast out and try to catch some of the rarest fish on the planet. A remarkable documentary series following the determined group of best friends, as they traverse dangerous roads, deadly terrain and precarious waters to achieve their dreams.

programme.title: The Context USA
programme.desc: Special coverage from Washington DC and London, focusing on President Trumps second term.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: The Context
programme.desc: The presenter and his regular panel of guests discuss the most important and relevant news stories of the day with correspondents around the globe. Join for expert analysis of the latest big events and exclusive interviews covering various current affair issues.

programme.title: Tech Now
programme.desc: Tech Now explores the latest innovations and technologies shaping our lives.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: Join BBC journalists including political editor Laura Kuenssberg, Europe editor Katya Adler, Brussels correspondent Adam Fleming and political correspondent Chris Mason in their weekly podcast discussing all of the news stories that matter to the people of the United Kingdom. The journalists know all about the stories that theyre talking about - they interview the most important people involved in the stories that feature in the news. They speak of their knowledge and understanding of the news in a way that is understandable for all. Laura is often in a car in the middle of a city where big politics stories are happening. Katya, Adam and Chris are usually in the studio. They regularly talk about Brexit and what is going to happen when the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. programme.title: Talking Business
programme.desc: On Talking Business BBC presenters, based in the worlds most dynamic cities, discuss with the most important and influential people from the world of business and finance, the key issues of the day. Corporate leaders, global investors, top creatives, cutting-edge entrepreneurs and leading intellectuals gather together weekly to discuss and analyse the issues and trends that most affect how business has to work in todays world. Our team of presenters are experts on the issues and developments which are shaping the way we work, consume and live in the 21st Century.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: Business Today
programme.desc: The latest business news from Singapore and around the world.

programme.desc: A round-up of the days sporting action.

programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: Join the Travel Show team as they take you on a criss-cross journey across the globe, visiting the most popular holiday destinations as well as sampling some hidden gems. The itinerary includes up-and-coming hot spots for holidaymakers and uncovering some lesser-known facts about places on many peoples bucket lists. This BBC programme takes you to every corner of the planet, providing an all-round insight into the world of travel. From winter wonderland activities such as eco skiing in Denmark and trekking across glaciers in Iceland, to warmer destinations as diverse as Rwanda and the Great Barrier Reef in Australia, your adventure starts here.

programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: Join the Travel Show team as they take you on a criss-cross journey across the globe, visiting the most popular holiday destinations as well as sampling some hidden gems. The itinerary includes up-and-coming hot spots for holidaymakers and uncovering some lesser-known facts about places on many peoples bucket lists. This BBC programme takes you to every corner of the planet, providing an all-round insight into the world of travel. From winter wonderland activities such as eco skiing in Denmark and trekking across glaciers in Iceland, to warmer destinations as diverse as Rwanda and the Great Barrier Reef in Australia, your adventure starts here.

programme.title: Focus on Africa
programme.desc: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program used to be presented by Komla Dumor each weekday from its inception until his death in 2014; now it is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. The program includes news, sport and business from across Africa and the rest of the globe. Get the top African stories and keep up with the latest international events.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: The Context
programme.desc: The presenter and his regular panel of guests discuss the most important and relevant news stories of the day with correspondents around the globe. Join for expert analysis of the latest big events and exclusive interviews covering various current affair issues.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: Join BBC journalists including political editor Laura Kuenssberg, Europe editor Katya Adler, Brussels correspondent Adam Fleming and political correspondent Chris Mason in their weekly podcast discussing all of the news stories that matter to the people of the United Kingdom. The journalists know all about the stories that theyre talking about - they interview the most important people involved in the stories that feature in the news. They speak of their knowledge and understanding of the news in a way that is understandable for all. Laura is often in a car in the middle of a city where big politics stories are happening. Katya, Adam and Chris are usually in the studio. They regularly talk about Brexit and what is going to happen when the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Tech Now
programme.desc: A round-up of some of the most innovative tech engineering featured on Tech Now.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.desc: The latest business news from Singapore and around the world.

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. Он уверен, что авария была подстроена и убийство отца, известного хирурга, было спланировано. Чтобы провести собственное расследование, Крылов соглашается вернуться к работе в полиции…

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: В городе происходит несколько нападений на инкассаторские машины. Налеты проводят дерзко, с убийствами. Дело дают в руки лучшего опера Киева Виктора Тарана, если он раскроет его, сможет претендовать на место начальника. А если банду не найдут в ближайшее время, то могут полететь головы вышестоящего начальства, так как обеспеченные влиятельные люди не любят терять свои деньги.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Оперативники находят машину, которую использовали грабители. Её владелец – алкоголик, который недавно отдал старое авто малознакомому парню. Один из бизнесменов, которому светит приговор, доносит генералу, кто меняет украденные из инкассаторских машин наличные. Если органы не захотят оказывать ему услугу, им придется объяснять прессе связь с крупными инвесторами, которые по стечению обстоятельств работают с менялами.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Раненый грабитель пытается самостоятельно вытянуть шар из ноги, затрагивает артерию и умирает. Милиция приезжает к нему на квартиру слишком поздно. Таран уверен, что последний налет организовал Таир, пытаясь отвести от себя подозрения. Но ни у одного из отделов никаких серьезных доказательств нет. Таран предлагает объединить свои усилия, чтобы найти убийц как можно скорее.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Убийство двух оперативников, самоубийство подозреваемого и арест коллеги при попытке незаконно купить оружие – все это сваливается на Тарана за одну ночь. В квартире беглеца грабителя находят целый "арсенал", теперь операм становится неясно, зачем грабителям надо было нападать на участкового. Они начинают расследовать его возможной причастности к налетам.

programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. Он уверен, что авария была подстроена и убийство отца, известного хирурга, было спланировано. Чтобы провести собственное расследование, Крылов соглашается вернуться к работе в полиции…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Крылов назначен начальником лаборатории. Он пытается сблизиться с Анной, но она вновь его отталкивает. Она не знает, что Лёшка попал под влияние только что вышедшего из тюрьмы преступника по фамилии Голубев. Тем временем в карьере найден труп молодого мужчины. Крылов сразу же выдвигает неожиданную версию – перед смертью с жертвой кто-то играл в догонялки…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Убийство двух оперативников, самоубийство подозреваемого и арест коллеги при попытке незаконно купить оружие – все это сваливается на Тарана за одну ночь. Они начинают расследовать его возможной причастности к налетам.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Таран узнает о покушении на преступника, который должен выйти из тюрьмы. Милиция организует подставного киллера, чтобы взять заказчика с поличным. Одновременно в городе скинхеды убивают молодого парня, главаря смельчаков, которые защищали приезжих чернокожих студентов.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Идейный парень стреляет в убийцу своего друга и прячется. Его начинают искать и милиция, и скинхеды. Компания расистов собирают на допрос, однако все они молчат и требуют адвокатов. Удается нажать только на одного парня, с условным сроком.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Во время выходного Джулс оказывается среди заложников в ресторане. Захвативший людей мужчина обвиняет владельца заведения в терроризме, утверждая, что тот причастен к взрыву, унёсшему множество жизней. Однако расследование, проведённое Группой Один, опровергает его обвинения. Вскоре становится ясно, что захватчик страдает от шизофрении.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Автобус с заключёнными попадает в аварию, и среди пострадавших — офицер Оливер МакКой из 52-го отделения, бывший наставник Спайка. Когда на место прибывает Группа Один, вскрываются неожиданные факты: МакКой оказался замешан в наркоторговле и похитил одного из заключённых. Несмотря на это, Спайк пытается помочь человеку, который когда-то был для него наставником.

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. Он уверен, что авария была подстроена и убийство отца, известного хирурга, было спланировано. Чтобы провести собственное расследование, Крылов соглашается вернуться к работе в полиции…

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Раненый грабитель пытается самостоятельно вытянуть шар из ноги, затрагивает артерию и умирает. Милиция приезжает к нему на квартиру слишком поздно. Таран уверен, что последний налет организовал Таир, пытаясь отвести от себя подозрения. Но ни у одного из отделов никаких серьезных доказательств нет. Таран предлагает объединить свои усилия, чтобы найти убийц как можно скорее.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Убийство двух оперативников, самоубийство подозреваемого и арест коллеги при попытке незаконно купить оружие – все это сваливается на Тарана за одну ночь. В квартире беглеца грабителя находят целый "арсенал", теперь операм становится неясно, зачем грабителям надо было нападать на участкового. Они начинают расследовать его возможной причастности к налетам.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Таран узнает о покушении на преступника, который должен выйти из тюрьмы. Милиция организует подставного киллера, чтобы взять заказчика с поличным. Одновременно в городе скинхеды убивают молодого парня, главаря смельчаков, которые защищали приезжих чернокожих студентов.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Идейный парень стреляет в убийцу своего друга и прячется. Его начинают искать и милиция, и скинхеды. Компания расистов собирают на допрос, однако все они молчат и требуют адвокатов. Удается нажать только на одного парня, с условным сроком.

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. Он уверен, что авария была подстроена и убийство отца, известного хирурга, было спланировано. Чтобы провести собственное расследование, Крылов соглашается вернуться к работе в полиции…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Крылов обнаруживает странную статистику смертей пациентов в клинике, где работал его отец и просит свою помощницу и подругу Матвеевну устроиться туда на работу "под прикрытием". Борису не дают покоя несколько фактов в деле убийства сына олигарха. Крылов проводит необычный следственный эксперимент и понимает, как именно было совершено это преступление…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Майора, подставного киллера, убивают в подъезде. Милиция понимает, кто-то из отдела слил информацию. Таран занят делом скинхедов и антирасистов, он ждет новых акций от ребят и ищет беглеца-свидетеля. Парень "залег на дно" в квартире у своей девушки, боясь мести скинов.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Таран уговаривает парня с антифа, который взял в заложники семью скинхеда, и он дает показания по поводу убийства своего друга. Гор, лидер скинов, понимает, что спонсоры бросили его. Он отказывается от поддержки верхов и решает самостоятельно разобраться с интернами.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: После того как Джеки задержали за попытку доступа к данным кредитных карт, она начинает сотрудничать с полицией в качестве информатора. Её парень, Александр Карсон, занимается клонированием карт. Когда Джеки сообщает о предстоящей встрече между своим знакомым и Марком Гриффином — подозреваемым в краже персональных данных, — Группа Один планирует задержание во время сделки. Однако ситуация выходит из-под контроля, и Джеки с Карсоном удаётся сбежать. Тем временем жена Эда ставит его перед выбором: семья или работа в Группе Один.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

He tries to get Tobias to slap his rear all day but it doesnt work. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When an unknown figure shows up and insults their Mom the kids are expecting a massive showdown but are surprised when Mom chooses the path of peace. Mom explains Yuki Masamis mother is an old school friend and repeatedly refuses to fight her despite further provocation. However when Yuki threatens to get Mom fired from her job Mom has no choice but to partake in a rematch of a karate match her and Yuki had fought as children.

Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin help Anais rescue her doll from Tina Rex. / Gumball and Darwin are unwitting accomplices in a gas station robbery. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally destroy Mr Robinsons new car… or do they? / Gumball experiences an impossibly unfortunate chain of events. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family. / Gumball is embarrassed when Mum comes to school to spend some "quality time". / Gumballs magic tinfoil helmet threatens to tear the Watterson family apart! / Anais is convinced that Gumball is being bullied by Tina Rex.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Colossus: Gumball and Darwin learn that it isnt wise to upset Hector Elmores resident Giant. / The Knights: Gumball and Tobias compete for Pennys affection by putting on the lamest duel in history. / The Remote: The Wattersons battle for possession of the TV remote gets dirty. / The Fridge: When Mom discovers Gumball has no ambition she is determined to turn him into a winner. / Gumball seeks justice when Banana Joe chews Darwins pen. / Gumball is determined to drive Penny away from Leslie / Darwin develops a texting addiction when he and Gumball get their first cell phone. / Richard gets a job as a pizza delivery man which worries Nicole when at the same time strange things begin to occur around the neighbourhood. / Gumball Darwin and Anais search for the Watterson family treasure.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its the night of the Big Dance, and Skinny has some serious moves ready to go. Shame well never get to see them; Skinny practices so hard that he renders himself unconscious. Luckily Skinny has a guardian angel in the form of a morphing orange blob. Lamput tries everything to wake Skinny back up, but nothing works; Lamput is gonna have to go above and beyond. Skinny (still out cold) shows up to the dance in a bright orange suit that seems to have a life of its own, and proceeds to tear up the dancefloor. When Skinny finally comes to, he finds out he was the hit of the big dance. Skinny walks off with the trophy and the gal. No-one thinks to thank lil Lamput. For a sworn enemy, this blob sure is a good friend.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin must stop an evil social media app from turning every kid in Elmore into mindless internet-trend-following drone.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin attempt to make a big impression at the coolest party of the year with the most praise-worthy entrance the world has ever seen.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Totally Spies
programme.desc: Its Halloween and Alex is super pumped they have a mission back in L.A. But a particle physicist brings ghosts to life, evil pumpkins are rampaging through the streets and the Spies are about to be sucked into another dimension. Halloween just got real!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball Darwin and Carrie team up to convince their fellow students that the school is haunted. At Halloween show and tell the class isnt buying Gumballs story about Gargaroth The Devourer until Carrie fakes a terrifying haunting. The kids convince the school to hire them as ghost exterminators and take their payment in Halloween candy. But when it turns out Gargaroth is real suddenly Gumball is expected to be the towns saviour.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are swapping scary stories on a family vacation, when their car breaks down in the middle of the desert. They are left with no alternative but to trust a complete stranger, whose appearance matches the scary guy in Moms story. When the stranger brings them to a derelict gas station, just as he did in moms made-up scary story, the Wattersons can no longer pretend the story isnt coming true.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. A breaking news report tells the Wattersons that their neighbour is among the several mysterious disappearances happening across Elmore. Their search for clues leads them to find a strange egg which they soon discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realise that its their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Grandpa Louie gives them a cheque, the Watterson kids argue over how to spend the money. / When they find Anais training herself for a brutal showdown Gumball and Darwin realise that their sister is being pestered at school by an annoying kid: Billy. / An impromptu hug with a stranger at school leaves Gumball in an increasingly awkward social situation. / Mom and the kids depart for their hard days work leaving a seemingly lazy Dad half-asleep on the sofa. programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The kids try to help Dad bond with Frankie. / When the uncomfortableness between them reaches new levels Gumball and Hot Dog Guy decide they have to confront their ongoing awkwardness by making things as awkward as possible. / The kids realise that theyve never known their neighbours name, and theyre way past the window where they can ask. / Gumball has something uncomfortable to tell Penny but doesnt know how, until he makes a deal with Principal Brown. / Gumball and Anais go head to head in a leadership election voted for by their classmates. / Clayton realises he can imitate his classmates, and begins stealing the lives of the people of Elmore. / When unexpected couples in the world of Elmore start randomly falling in love, Gumball and Darwin have to figure out whats going on. / Gumball questions Mr Smalls eco-friendly commitment, causing him to abandon society and live in the forest. Director: Mic Graves.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput into the darkest jungle, where they have a go at the literal oldest trick in the book: a covered pit trap. Why these guys think this will work is anyones guess. Meanwhile Lamputs facing a whole different challenge: a lost baby elephant is looking for her mama, and seems to have a knack for getting in all kinds of trouble along the way. Lamput and the baby elephant do eventually find the mama pachyderm - with help from the Docs. And their stupid pit trap. Yet again these guys have caught more than they bargained for.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Knights: Gumball and Tobias compete for Pennys affection by putting on the lamest duel in history. / The Remote: The Wattersons battle for possession of the TV remote gets dirty. / The Fridge: When Mom discovers Gumball has no ambition she is determined to turn him into a winner. / Gumball seeks justice when Banana Joe chews Darwins pen. / Gumball is determined to drive Penny away from Leslie / Darwin develops a texting addiction when he and Gumball get their first cell phone.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput takes refuge in a fancy hotel. Specs and Skinny bluff their way past the doorman by acting like they come from the expensive side of the tracks. Spoiler: they dont. The honeymoon suite is like nothing theyve ever seen; the Docs sheen of respectability quickly evaporates when theres robes to wear and beds to jump on. Their taste of the good life doesnt last long, though; another Lamput chase results in a proper trashed hotel room, just like you read about. Then downstairs for some à la carte chaos in the hotel restaurant. Its bad news for the Docs when the tab comes due; a Lab wage wont cover these extras.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are surprised to discover that their past actions have consequences. / Whilst Gumball and Darwin make fun of Mum and Dad for being old their voices start to break. / Sarah the new kid in school is Gumball and Darwins number one slightly obsessive fan. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / Miss Simian has to save herself from a contagious Joy virus infecting the whole school. / The secret behind Antons immortality. / The kids finally get the puppy they always wanted except its a turtle. / When Mum reveals that Gumballs real name is Zach Gumball adopts a cheesy annoying persona to match the name. / Nothing much is happening for Gumball and Darwin and the background characters in Elmore seize their moment.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Nicole wants a new family portrait where everyones entire face is in the photo and theyre all smiling.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Richard must retrace the memories of his day in order to figure out what "the thing" is, so Nicoles family dinner with Granny Jo Jo wont be another epic failure.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌

programme.title: Tiny Toons Looniversity
programme.desc: In this two-part episode, Sweetie and Busters plan to give their friends a non-scary Halloween goes awry. With a creepy farmhouse and ghosts galore, the toons must work together to face their fears…and a villain they didnt see coming.

programme.title: Tiny Toons Looniversity

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Folks, have ya heard? Your favorite Looney Tunes characters are back in action! Featuring updated stories and everyones favorite characters, these all-new animated episodes revitalize the iconic series known and loved for decades. Back to their old tricks are Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, and other marquee Looney Tunes characters who promise to delight audiences young and old with their zany adventures, slapstick comedy, and madcap energy. Get ready to have some fun - thats all, folks!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are swapping scary stories on a family vacation, when their car breaks down in the middle of the desert. They are left with no alternative but to trust a complete stranger, whose appearance matches the scary guy in Moms story. When the stranger brings them to a derelict gas station, just as he did in moms made-up scary story, the Wattersons can no longer pretend the story isnt coming true.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. A breaking news report tells the Wattersons that their neighbour is among the several mysterious disappearances happening across Elmore. Their search for clues leads them to find a strange egg which they soon discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realise that its their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball: The Gumball Chronicles
programme.desc: When Gumballs sister Anais researches the Watterson family tree, she uncovers a long history of nonsense. / Gumballs dad has been revealed as "Elmores Most Wanted" - but when the Chief of Police tries to investigate, things do not go according to plan. / Gumball, Darwin and Anais need to find the perfect Mothers Day gift. Will it be a cute card, a thoughtful painting or something entirely different? / When Gumballs schoolfriend Leslie finds an old video tape, the creepy mystery of Elmores ghostly past unfolds.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny amazing sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Darwin asks Gumball to teach him how to skate Gumball makes sure that he covers every aspect of the skating lifestyle - from wearing the right gear using the right terms and choosing the right board. But when Darwin finally gets his wheels rolling he realises there might be one important aspect of skating that Gumball hasnt taught him...

Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nicole arranges a playdate for Anais with the son of a classy lady she met at the supermarket. / Richard has lost all of the familys money. Nicole is happy for the Wattersons to appear in a Joyful Burger commercial for some much needed cash. / Darwin joins the school marching band and his tin-whistle talent lands him the solo. / Rob creates a variety of spinoff Elmore shows and formats in order to replace Gumball.

programme.title: What We Know with Max Foster
programme.desc: Max Foster has a definitive roundup of the days top stories, giving you the urgent need-to-know context, plus a deeper dive into the questions sparking debate around the world.

programme.title: Quest Means Business
programme.desc: Hes not messing around: Richard Quest presents his hot takes on the biggest breaking stories in the world of business. Watch for the expert analysis, commentary and opinions on the important headlines in the field from the notorious English journalist and CNN anchor. Joined by a cast of experts and correspondents delivering unrivaled facts and news, but also features and fascinating takes, figures and analysis on everything going down in the world of business.

programme.title: The Lead with Jake Tapper
programme.desc: News, politics and current affairs programme hosted by the award-winning, American journalist and author, Jake Tapper. Jake Tapper is the chief Washington correspondent for CNN and he will share his knowledge and insight into politics as well as covering a variety of other topics. This programme discusses a range of stories from topical events including national news, economics/finance, sports, health, technology and world affairs. The Lead with Jake Tapper has won a number of awards and accolades including three National Headliner Awards. Outside his work on television, Tapper has written for The New Yorker, The Washington Post and the Los Angeles Times as well as publishing his first novel, a political thriller.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: The Brief with Jim Sciutto
programme.desc: The best of CNNs reporting from correspondents across the world, to guide global audiences through the fast-paced news cycle with insight, analysis and hard-hitting interviews.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper delves into the days news, looking beyond the broadcast to give his take, prompting us to re-think what we hear in the headlines. Cooper has covered major, international stories like the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina on the Gulf Coast, the catastrophic BP oil spill and the 2010 earthquake in Haiti, which saw the whole world fall silent. The show has won an absolute plethora of awards over the years, including GLAAD Media and Emmy awards.

programme.title: The Source with Kaitlan Collins
programme.desc: Kaitlan Collins goes straight to the source for the best reporting on the days biggest stories.

programme.title: CNN NewsNight
programme.desc: Abby Phillip leads a roundtable discussion on the days biggest stories and issues shaping our world.

programme.title: Laura Coates Live
programme.desc: Laura Coates goes inside the story with a relentless pursuit of the facts.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.desc: Max Foster has a definitive roundup of the days top stories, giving you the urgent need-to-know context, plus a deeper dive into the questions sparking debate around the world.

programme.title: Quest Means Business
programme.desc: Hes not messing around: Richard Quest presents his hot takes on the biggest breaking stories in the world of business. Watch for the expert analysis, commentary and opinions on the important headlines in the field from the notorious English journalist and CNN anchor. Joined by a cast of experts and correspondents delivering unrivaled facts and news, but also features and fascinating takes, figures and analysis on everything going down in the world of business.

programme.title: The Lead with Jake Tapper
programme.desc: News, politics and current affairs programme hosted by the award-winning, American journalist and author, Jake Tapper. Jake Tapper is the chief Washington correspondent for CNN and he will share his knowledge and insight into politics as well as covering a variety of other topics. This programme discusses a range of stories from topical events including national news, economics/finance, sports, health, technology and world affairs. The Lead with Jake Tapper has won a number of awards and accolades including three National Headliner Awards. Outside his work on television, Tapper has written for The New Yorker, The Washington Post and the Los Angeles Times as well as publishing his first novel, a political thriller.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: The Brief with Jim Sciutto
programme.desc: The best of CNNs reporting from correspondents across the world, to guide global audiences through the fast-paced news cycle with insight, analysis and hard-hitting interviews.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper delves into the days news, looking beyond the broadcast to give his take, prompting us to re-think what we hear in the headlines. Cooper has covered major, international stories like the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina on the Gulf Coast, the catastrophic BP oil spill and the 2010 earthquake in Haiti, which saw the whole world fall silent. The show has won an absolute plethora of awards over the years, including GLAAD Media and Emmy awards.

programme.title: The Source with Kaitlan Collins
programme.desc: Kaitlan Collins goes straight to the source for the best reporting on the days biggest stories.

programme.title: Naked And Afraid Apocalypse
programme.desc: Wes scavenges materials to take on his croc nemesis. A survivalist scores the challenges first big kill. The wasteland forces two more to bow out.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: Unique American reality series that follows a group of friends in Utah- David Heavy D Sparks, David Diesel Dave Kiley, and their crew at DieselSellerz who sell parts for diesel trucks and jeeps, repair and customize pickup trucks. They design and build some of the biggest and most amazing diesel powered vehicles you will ever see, and also do truck giveaways. Watch as they create these awesome masterpieces and enjoy all the crazy adventures they get into while doing it.

programme.title: Naked And Afraid Apocalypse
programme.desc: Wes scavenges materials to take on his croc nemesis. A survivalist scores the challenges first big kill. The wasteland forces two more to bow out.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. programme.title: Wheeler Dealers

It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. The hit series returns to uncover the miraculous feats of engineering which underpin life in the 21st century. How the seemingly mundane are often the result of highly sophisticated engineering and production processes. This fascinating behind-the-scenes journey delves deep into the production of everyday modern items from surfboards to satchels and trombones to cricket bats.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers

programme.title: Mighty Truckers
programme.desc: This real-life road show follows the lives of twenty truckers from four different countries - Poland, Italy, Germany and the Netherlands. These unique and diverse characters will show the viewers the world of transport, introducing them with the profession of "truck driver". Who are these men and women who ensure that we get various goods on time day and night? What makes them choose the life on the road? This show will answer these questions in an "up close and personal" portrait of trucker life.

programme.title: Mighty Truckers
programme.desc: This real-life road show follows the lives of twenty truckers from four different countries - Poland, Italy, Germany and the Netherlands. These unique and diverse characters will show the viewers the world of transport, introducing them with the profession of "truck driver". Who are these men and women who ensure that we get various goods on time day and night? What makes them choose the life on the road? This show will answer these questions in an "up close and personal" portrait of trucker life.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain
programme.desc: Going through customs can be a stressful experience for most people, even more so if youre attempting to smuggle drugs or weapons into the country. Follow the efforts of the Security and Customs Services at the border of Spain, as they work hard to keep their country safe from criminals. Whether its drugs, weapons or even terrorism, theres a lot of things security have to consider in order to make sure all threats are handled properly. These security forces are always hot on the trail of suspicious activity, in the air, on land or away at sea.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain
programme.desc: Going through customs can be a stressful experience for most people, even more so if youre attempting to smuggle drugs or weapons into the country. Follow the efforts of the Security and Customs Services at the border of Spain, as they work hard to keep their country safe from criminals. Whether its drugs, weapons or even terrorism, theres a lot of things security have to consider in order to make sure all threats are handled properly. These security forces are always hot on the trail of suspicious activity, in the air, on land or away at sea.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Shortys Dream Shop
programme.desc: Shorty and the team turn the shell of a 67 Nova into a mean street machine. They go back to stock with a new motor, transmission, interior and paint.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. The hit series returns to uncover the miraculous feats of engineering which underpin life in the 21st century. programme.title: Fast n Loud
programme.desc: Fast N Loud is a reality styled TV show featuring Richard Rawlings and his crew from the Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage. For most people old rusty cars in garages or open spaces are nothing but junk, but not for these guys. For them it is a perfect chance to reconstruct such vehicles and make some money. The old run-down cars are restored flawlessly and are able to run steadily for the next 10 years for sure. Richard and his crew work really hard to make a name for themselves and have become a huge success thanks to their enormous talents.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Freddy Dodges Mine Rescue
programme.desc: Mining veteran Freddy Dodge teams up with expert mechanic Juan Ibarra to help struggling mine owners with their failing operations. The pair come to the rescue sharing useful advice, practical knowledge and exclusive gold recovery techniques to transform the operations that could change the lives the mine owners forever.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Did you know that Australia accounts for over 95% of the worlds supply of opal? Well, these miners do, and in this documentary series we follow groups of brave and persevering souls as they scour the land in search of the precious and highly valuable gemstone. With many of the mines located in the desolately deserted Outback, the crews must face some of Australias most treacherous landscapes if they are to hit the jackpot. The six crews have to weigh up the consequences in these old and hazardous mines, often risking their lives in search of opal wealth, not to mention preventing opportunistic thieves from snatching their hauls.

programme.title: Speed Cops
programme.desc: Road police on the hunt for posers and speeders all over Germany. The professionals know exactly whats impressive about cars - and whats illegal.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: Fast n Loud
programme.desc: Fast N Loud is a reality styled TV show featuring Richard Rawlings and his crew from the Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage. For most people old rusty cars in garages or open spaces are nothing but junk, but not for these guys. For them it is a perfect chance to reconstruct such vehicles and make some money. The old run-down cars are restored flawlessly and are able to run steadily for the next 10 years for sure. Richard and his crew work really hard to make a name for themselves and have become a huge success thanks to their enormous talents.

programme.title: Mike Brewer: Born Dealer
programme.desc: Mike Brewer and his wife, Michelle, take on a new adventure closer to home, sharing a sneak peek into their lives at their new dealership in Warwick.

programme.title: Twin Turbos
programme.desc: Reality show that follows father and son duo Doug and Brad DeBerti who create one-of-a-kind custom cars and trucks for DeBerti Designs, their own firm, based in Arroyo Grande. Viewers will have a chance to see some high-profile projects such as a truck modeled after a fighter jet, the first ever drift-racing truck, a classic van transformed into a hot rod racing machine and many more cool projects. Besides building and customizing vehicles, Brad has another dream - to become a NASCAR driver, which he will try to do with the help from his mentor, NASCAR driver Joey Logano.
